description: Sample conversation for testing calendar event extraction
scenario: Parent group chat planning school events and activities

messages.content: Hey everyone! Just a reminder that the parent-teacher conferences are next Thursday, November 2nd at 3:30 PM in Room 204.
Thanks Sarah! Also, don't forget Emma's birthday party is on Saturday November 4th at 2 PM at the park pavilion.
Perfect timing! I was about to send out invites. The kids have soccer practice every Tuesday and Thursday at 5 PM starting next week.
Oh and the school Fall Festival is on October 31st from 6-8 PM. They need volunteers!
We should grab coffee sometime soon
Definitely! How about next Monday morning at 10 AM at the usual Starbucks?
